Document.Focus: Helping your child understand a cancer diagnosis

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Helping your child understand a cancer diagnosis
QAPair.Answer: Learning that your child has cancer can feel overwhelming and scary. You want to protect your child, not only from the cancer, but also from the fear that comes with having a serious illness. Explaining what it means to have cancer will not be easy. Here are some things to know when talking with a child about having cancer.
